name: python-service-skills
description: Python service development skills — Witchcraft ecosystem, data libraries, HTTP, observability, CLI, resilience, and more

plugins.name: apollo-clone
plugins.description: Continuous delivery platform on k3s with Product Catalog, Entity lifecycle, OrchestrationEngine, and SpokeAgent deployment

plugins.name: attrs
plugins.description: Python classes without boilerplate using attrs

plugins.name: blinker
plugins.description: Fast signal/event dispatching for Python (observer pattern)

plugins.name: burr
plugins.description: State machine framework for AI agent workflows with persistence and tracking UI

plugins.name: casbin
plugins.description: Policy-based authorization supporting ACL, RBAC, and ABAC models

plugins.name: cattrs
plugins.description: Composable converters for structuring and unstructuring data with cattrs

plugins.name: cherry
plugins.description: Opinionated Python server framework (Witchcraft port) with structured logging, health checks, and tracing

plugins.name: citadel
plugins.description: Lightweight K3s platform with zero-trust networking and ephemeral nodes

plugins.name: click
plugins.description: Composable command-line interface framework

plugins.name: croniter
plugins.description: Cron expression parser and datetime iterator

plugins.name: datetimerange
plugins.description: Datetime range operations including intersection, union, containment, and iteration

plugins.name: deepdiff
plugins.description: Deep comparison and diffing of Python objects

plugins.name: docker-generator
plugins.description: Pure Python Dockerfile generation library with DockerfileBuilder fluent API

plugins.name: dynaconf
plugins.description: Layered configuration management with multi-format and environment support

plugins.name: enchant
plugins.description: Type-safe API contract code generation from .enchant.yml DSL to attrs models, server stubs, and httpx clients

plugins.name: forge-pipeline
plugins.description: Workflow for packaging, containerizing, and publishing Python services using Forge tools

plugins.name: httpx
plugins.description: Modern HTTP client for Python with sync and async support

plugins.name: immutables
plugins.description: High-performance immutable mapping (HAMT) for Python

plugins.name: jinja2
plugins.description: Fast template engine with inheritance, macros, and sandboxed execution

plugins.name: lark
plugins.description: Modern parsing library with grammar-as-data design for building parsers and DSLs

plugins.name: networkx
plugins.description: Graph and network analysis with DAGs, topological sorting, and graph algorithms

plugins.name: opentelemetry
plugins.description: Vendor-neutral distributed tracing, metrics, and observability

plugins.name: orjson
plugins.description: Fast JSON serialization in Rust with native datetime/numpy/dataclass support

plugins.name: pendulum
plugins.description: Timezone-aware datetime replacement with immutable, fluent API

plugins.name: platform-deploy
plugins.description: Workflow for deploying and operating services on the Apollo CD platform running on Citadel K3s clusters

plugins.name: pluggy
plugins.description: Hook-based plugin system, battle-tested in pytest

plugins.name: punq
plugins.description: Minimal dependency injection container for Python

plugins.name: python-dateutil
plugins.description: Powerful datetime extensions with flexible parsing and relative deltas

plugins.name: pyyaml
plugins.description: YAML parser and emitter for Python

plugins.name: release-hub
plugins.description: Apollo Hub publishing client with version detection and release channel mapping

plugins.name: returns
plugins.description: Typed, composable error handling with Result, Maybe, and IO containers

plugins.name: rich
plugins.description: Rich text and beautiful formatting for the terminal

plugins.name: rule-engine
plugins.description: Safe business rule evaluation with Python-like expression syntax

plugins.name: rune
plugins.description: Composable validation and serialization built on attrs/cattrs with constraints, aliases, and JSON Schema

plugins.name: semantic-version
plugins.description: Semantic versioning (SemVer 2.0.0) parsing, comparison, and range matching

plugins.name: service-launcher
plugins.description: Go binary for running Python services in containers with memory management and readiness probes

plugins.name: sls-distribution
plugins.description: Pants plugin for packaging Python services as SLS distributions

plugins.name: sqlalchemy
plugins.description: SQLAlchemy 2.0 ORM and SQL toolkit for database models and queries

plugins.name: structlog
plugins.description: Structured logging with processor pipelines and context binding

plugins.name: tenacity
plugins.description: Composable retry logic for Python with backoff and stop conditions

plugins.name: toolz
plugins.description: Functional programming primitives — pipe, curry, compose, and data transformations

plugins.name: transitions
plugins.description: Lightweight finite state machine (FSM) library with hierarchical and async support

plugins.name: transmute
plugins.description: Zero-downtime online schema migration framework with 8-state lifecycle and dual-write routing

plugins.name: typer
plugins.description: CLI builder using Python type hints, built on Click

plugins.name: witchcraft-service
plugins.description: Workflow for building production Python services using the Witchcraft stack (Enchant + Cherry + Rune + Transmute)
